alpha¶

Parameter determining the sahpe of the Beta function for entities tp, alpha_tp (dimensionless)

beta¶

Parameter determining the sahpe of the Beta function for entities tp, beta_tp (dimensionless)

Michaelis-Menten constants defining photosynthetic N synthesis associated to xilem influx for entities tp, k_tp,1 (g.g-1)

k2¶

Michaelis-Menten constants defining photosynthetic N synthesis associated to xilem influx for entities tp, k_tp,2 (J.m-2.d-1)

p¶

Proportion coefficient for N influx following dry mass influx into entities tp, delta_tp,i (g.g-1.oC.d-1)

params¶

Get/Set the Parameters with dictionary

pdeath¶

Proportion of maximum specific N mass at which tissues die for entities tp, d_tp (dimensionless)

peff¶

Photosynthetic efficiency, epsilon_tp (g.J-1)

pm1¶

Intercept of the linear relationship linking photosynthetic area, omega_tp,1 (g.m-2.d-1)

pm2¶

Slope of the linear relationship linking photosynthetic area, omega_tp,2 (d-1)

sink¶

Theoretical maximum root N uptake at saturating soil N concentration, U_r,max, (g.m-3.oCd-1)

Parameter determining the shape of the Beta function for roots, alpha_r (dimensionless)

beta¶

Parameter determining the shape of the Beta function for roots, beta_r (dimensionless)

beta2¶

Coefficient for C availability effect on root C uptake, beta_C (dimensionless)

Constant of the michaelis function reflecting HATS activity, beta_C, (g.m-3)

kroot2¶

Constant of the michaelis function reflecting HATS activity, beta_C, (g.m-3)

p¶

Proportion coefficient for N influx following dry mass influx into roots, p_r (dimensionless)
